name: Battle Pals Unfinished Prototype
description:
what is this?

Battle Pals is my attempt at a Smash-inspired local multiplayer fighting game. The game currently features 4 playable characters, 1 stage, and two game modes. Keyboard input is supported, but the game was really designed with controllers in mind.

why is it scrapped?

This game was way more work than I expected. By the time I reached where I am now, I was burnt out and tired of working on it. So I've decided to put it out there in it's current state, and work on something else. I plan on returning to it one day, but for now I hope people can get a kick out of it.

keyboard controls:

  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • J - Jump
  • I - Attack
  • O - Special Attack
  • K - Switch palette

gamepad controls:

  • Left Stick/Dpad - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Attack
  • B - Special Attack
  • Y - Switch Palette
